author: The Irish Times
title: Relatives and staff: Are you concerned about Covid-19 in care homes?
description: Staffing, testing and supplies of PPE among the challenges facing the sector
content: The spread of Covid-19 in nursing homes is a catastrophe in the making, according to professor of infectious diseases at the Mater and Rotunda hospitals Prof Jack Lambert, with almost one-third of nursing homes in Ireland reporting cases of coronavirus. Staff… [+694 chars]
